name: Power of the Essence
description:
Experiment and be curious with new plants, they seem really unusual.

You have found unusual plants on your desk in your lab, you decided  to experiment with them. Later on, you found out they can be massively destructive!

Detailed tutorial:

  • You may use more than one plant at the time.
  • Order does matter.
  • Try "Try and error" method.
  • Try more logic way.
  • There are more possible ways to achieve given goal.

This game was made for "Sleepless Inc. Jam #3 - Mad Scientist" it was my tenth Game Jam. The theme was "Mad Scientist".

Everything in the game is created by me in limit of 50 hours.

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
